name: BitParkourer
description:
Run , jump and do parkour to survive system shutdown!

BitParkourer is a small 3d parkour-running  game, where you are bit-guy in a pc world city, who has to run to the next recovery point, because the pc is full of errors and leaks and it's going to turn off. You will run and jump across a lot of data storages in the RAM, but watch out!Those leaks will bring you back !

Imagine you performing a super jump and reaching the next platform  for a hair. Feel the power of your runner skills, while avoiding black leaks!

In this game you will:

-Perform simple jump

-Perform cool long jump

-Run and collect the data

-Avoid black leaks

-Save yourself from the shutdown

Ready to save the data from the errors, doing some parkour?

Can you feel the power of your super jump?

Are you curious of what there's in the next RAM layer?

So Download and Play!

F.A.Q

1) Who made this game?

This game is made by SmallFast, an aspiring game developer, that wants to do experience so that one day he will make games for living.

2)What's the quality of his game?

Since he's only a beginner and he's self taught, the quality is not very high, but it can be at least enjoyable as you can see in his old games Height Jumper and Burning Cowboy ( you can search them on this site).

3)How does this game last?

BitParkourer is very very small. There are five levels, that individually requieres about 1-2 minutes to complete.

4)Is it a waste of time?

If you are searching for high quality games or well-refined games, maybe this isn't for you. But I can give you a simple and acceptable gameplay experience from which you can have some fun!

5)Do I have to pay in order to play?

No, the game is totally free. But it will be nice if you write a little feedback in the comment so that I can learn from you and improve my skills.

Upload:30/01/2018

I've accindentally uploaded an invalid reference. Now you can download the actual game.
